name: Trial of Ancient Gods
description:
The game is a single player,roguelike action game on PC thatfocus on creating an intenseaction experience along with aupgrade system for players whoenjoy playing with differentcombat style to defeat enemies

Control:

Move: WASD

Light attack: mouse left click

Heavy attack: mouse right click

Rune: Q

OVERVIEW

Player will play as an ordinary follower in a cult. He joined the cult with no interest inworshiping gods of any kind but to simply make a living. One day, he is given a missionto retrieve a relic that contains the power of ancient gods and here the journey starts.

The player will fight their way through many rooms. The combination of rooms israndomly generated from a pool of pre-designed rooms, several rooms forms acomplete region. ln each region, there will be a boss room. Defeating the boss in thisregion, player will proceed to the next region.

The player can perform a light attack, a heavy attack. And the player holds a slot formagic runes that have powerful spells, Upon clearing a room, players are blessed withthe power of ancient gods based on the type of monsters in this room and becomemore powerful
